sentences.english: The platypus and the echidna are egg-laying mammals.
sentences.chinese: 鴨嘴獸和針鼴是產卵哺乳動物。

sentences.english: The Echidna leads the GTMS Team Australia defense.
sentences.chinese: 針鼴帶領澳大利亞隊防守。

sentences.english: The mother spiny anteater lays one or two eggs.
sentences.chinese: 針鼴媽媽生一到兩個蛋。
